function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete understanding of optimal credit guarantee ratio in the banking industry for SME loans in ASEAN countries during and after COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Inefficient allocation of credit guarantees, leading to higher default rates and economic instability","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research and analysis of factors affecting credit guarantee ratio in the context of ASEAN countries","Technologies":"Data analytics, economic modeling software","People":"Banking industry, policymakers, SMEs","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Moral hazard resulting from adopting the same credit guarantee ratio for all banks","Impact":"Increased risk of irresponsible lending and higher default rates","Mitigation":"Implement differential credit guarantee ratios based on the financial soundness of the lender, economic climate, and government policies","Technologies":"Risk assessment software, data analysis tools","People":"Banking industry, regulatory authorities","Owner":"Central banks, financial regulators"},{"Description":"Incomplete modeling of the credit guarantee ratio may lead to suboptimal policy decisions","Impact":"Inefficient allocation of credit guarantees, leading to higher default rates and economic instability","Mitigation":"Develop accurate modeling techniques to determine the optimal credit guarantee ratio based on lender financial soundness, economic climate, and government policies","Technologies":"Quantitative modeling software, economic simulation tools","People":"Policy analysts, economists, banking industry","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
